name: StencilUI- Design system UIKit
description:
StencilUI is a beautifully crafted design system for designers/product teams to design high-quality mobile designs in record time. 


This UI kit is designed to give you a quick start to any mobile product you are developing. We have carefully designed StencilUI to be simple and helpful in designing timeless mobile apps interfaces, By focusing on what is most essential for your mobile products.


Features

  • Dark mode
  • Layout Grid style
  • Color style
  • Hybrid design (suitable for iOs and Andriod)


Components

  • Button
  • Inputs
  • List
  • Alerts
  • Badges
  • and more
